thread.section_title: Regent Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel
thread.title_full: Great hotel - Review of Regent Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Patti D
title: Great hotel
text:
The minute you walk through the front door you know you are in a five star hotel. The place is decorated very nicely in a modern way. The rooms are a good size with all the amenities you need. Even had something in the room I had never seen, a fire hood for emergencies. So glad we didn't need it. I love the bathroom with its soaker tub, it is especially appreciated after a long day of sight seeing.
Room service delivered our dinner fairly fast, I though we would have to wait at least an hour.
I would definitely stay here again.
